articles.title: Tata Motors registered total sales of 2,65090 units in Q4 FY24 - Tata Motors
articles.description:
Total PV Sales of 1,55,651 units, +15% YoY
Total CV Sales of 1,09,439 units, -6% YoY

Tata Motors Limited sales in the domestic & international market for Q4 FY 2023-24 stood at 2,65,090 vehicles, compared to 2,51,822 units during Q4 FY 2022-23.
